00081 void bella()
00082 {
00083   vector<double> z, conf,y,si;
00084         //vector<int> call;
00085   vector<affx::GType> call;
00086         vector<int> H;
00087         int length;
00088         snp_param sp;
00089         sp.Initialize();
00090         length = 20;
00091         si.assign(length,0);
00092 
00093         z.resize(length);
00094         y.resize(length);
00095         conf.resize(length);
00096         call.resize(length);
00097         z[1] = 0;
00098         z[2] = 0.66;
00099         /*for (int q=0; q<21; q++)
00100         {
00101                 z[0] = -1.0 +q*0.1;
00102         }*/
00103         seven(z);
00104                 bayes_label(call,conf,z,y,H,si, sp);
00105                 printf("M: %f %f %f\n",sp.prior.aa.m,sp.prior.ab.m,sp.prior.bb.m);
00106                 printf("P: %f %f %f\n",sp.posterior.aa.m,sp.posterior.ab.m,sp.posterior.bb.m);
00107                 for (int i=0; i<length;i++)
00108                 {       
00109                         printf("Z: %f\t%d\t%f\n",z[i],call[i],conf[i]);
00110                 }
00111                 printf("\n");
00112         
00113 }

00115 void test_bins()
00116 {
00117   vector<double> z, conf,y, si;
00118         vector<affx::GType> call;
00119         vector<int> H;
00120         int length;
00121         double tmp;
00122         snp_param sp;
00123 
00124         sp.Initialize();
00125         length = 20;
00126 
00127         z.resize(length);
00128         y.resize(length);
00129         call.resize(length);
00130         conf.resize(length);
00131         si.assign(length,0);
00132 
00133         for (int qi=0; qi<length; qi++)
00134         {
00135                 tmp = .66+.001*qi;
00136                 if (qi<2*length/3)
00137                         tmp= 0 + .001*qi;
00138                 if (qi<length/3)
00139                         tmp = -.66+.001*qi;
00140                 z[qi] = tmp;
00141         }
00142         sp.bins = 5;
00143 
00144                 bayes_label(call,conf,z,y,H,si,sp);
00145                 printf("M: %f %f %f\n",sp.prior.aa.m,sp.prior.ab.m,sp.prior.bb.m);
00146                 printf("P: %f %f %f\n",sp.posterior.aa.m,sp.posterior.ab.m,sp.posterior.bb.m);
00147                 for (int i=0; i<length;i++)
00148                 {       
00149                         printf("Z: %f\t%d\t%f\n",z[i],call[i],conf[i]);
00150                 }
00151                 printf("\n");
00152         sp.bins = 50;
00153         bayes_label(call,conf,z,y,H,si,sp);
00154                 printf("M: %f %f %f\n",sp.prior.aa.m,sp.prior.ab.m,sp.prior.bb.m);
00155                 printf("P: %f %f %f\n",sp.posterior.aa.m,sp.posterior.ab.m,sp.posterior.bb.m);
00156                 for (int i=0; i<length;i++)
00157                 {       
00158                         printf("Z: %f\t%d\t%f\n",z[i],call[i],conf[i]);
00159                 }
00160                 printf("\n");   
00161 }
